summary: A Modders Resource adding 3 fully scripted "Armorsets", these garant greater boni if worn together.
descriptionHtml:
Contens:
3 Sets with diffent set boni:
One Assissine/Thiefset garanting 2 activationable boni: (usinge the vanilla Leatherarmormeshes)

A toggleable Nightvision constantly taking away some magika.(gained by the helmet aditional setparts reduce its costs)
It ends automatically if: You disable it, can't affort the magika, or unequip the helmet.

A toggleable cloak, which hides you and makes you invulnerable, but takes away your health, (but it's still save to use, gained by any setpart, additional parts reduce its costs)
It ends automatically if: You disable it, end up with low health, activate or attack something, use a spell, or unequip the completeset.

One enchanted Mage Clothing: (using different vanilla models)
The enchantments of each part increase if you equip the other parts.

And one Warriorset: (using the ironarmormeshes)
This adds a damage migrating perk, which becomes stronger the more parts you equip.


The main work is done via keywords and conditions.
You gain these sets directly after load, as this makes testing easier.
There is no Problem to replasce the vanilla armor meshes by a custom one.
All Scriptscources inside.
You can use this freely in any file as log as you credit me.
author: ubuntufreakdragon
